tool_description: An API that allows will calculate how long it will take to read some text, or to create  summary  of a larger amount of text (e.g. TLDR)
name: Quick Summary and Readtime
title: Quick Summary and Readtime

api_list.name: Summarization
api_list.description: Makes a summary of your article/blog or other text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quick-summary-and-readtime.p.rapidapi.com/summary/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quick-summary-and-readtime.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Read Time
api_list.description: Determine how long it will take to read an article
